PageTitle: default med (BGP-IPv4 multicast address family view)
FuncDef:
The default med command sets the default MED for MBGP routes.
The undo default med command restores the default configuration.
By default, the MED value of an imported route equals the cost of the imported route; the MED value carried in a route learned.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the MED for MBGP routes.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 4294967295.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The system prefers the route with the smallest MED for the traffic entering the local AS if the other attributes of multiple available routes are the same.
